value:
Roy, my father...people were always
there for me, no matter how hard
things got...$k$pThat's why I can't give up. I have
to fight, for everyone's sake!

Your power seems entirely different
from the magic I know. Is it like the
Dragon's Gate, perhaps? I wonder...

All right now, why don't you take
a break. You seem a bit out of
sorts, so why not relax?

I still study magic every day. It's just
habit now! And Roy's the same with
his sword training.

I caught a glimpse of a young version
of my father! He had a child with him.
I think it might have been me...$k$pIt felt a bit odd, so I kept my distance.

We can be friends too, right,
$Nu?

My magic is a weapon of peace!
With it, I will incinerate evil!

I may not fight like my father, but
I won't embarrass myself in
battle either.

...Hm? Oh, sorry! Was I staring off
into the distance in the middle of
a battle?

Thank you. Let's keep helping each
other succeed, just like this!

I am Lilina. I hope to succeed my
father, Hector, and create an age
of peace.

There was a time I thought myself
utterly alone, that there was no one
who would help me.$k$pMy father, a truly magnificent man,
was gone. And I thought I had to do
it all on my own. But I was wrong.$k$pRoy was there for me...and he
wanted me there for him as well...$k$pWithout Roy and Cecilia's support,
perhaps I, too, would have lost faith
in humanity as King Zephiel did.$k$pIt's better this way, relying on others,
standing side by side with friends...$k$pThat is why you must continue to
love this world and offer it your
support... For the sake of all of us.
はっ！
せやっ！
きゃああっ！
負けたりなんか…！
This is everything I've got!
I call upon the red fire!
This is the end!
I won't give up!
There's still time...
Oh my.
Legendary Hero? Are you talking about Roy or my father?
Hm? The greetings of your country are quite different from the greetings of my own...
Even during peacetime, there are still so many who need a helping hand...
Through your efforts, I believe that this world can also find peace.
You are such a mysterious person... I'd love to learn more about you.
If it truly is the heavens that have given me this gift...then I'll use it for everyone's benefit.
No matter what world I find myself in, I'll be fine as long as you're by my side.
Yes?
What should I do?
My turn, then.
